comment: Take her! Make sure you don't miss any deadlines though. Very heavy homework load like all KSU health classes on Bearface. Not a strict grader. Quizzes difficult but ALL of the answers are in the textbook!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: By far my favorite at KSU! Lectures are fun and interesting. I actually didnt mind the group projects in this class. She really cares about people. She expects a lot from you and there is a lot of work but it is not difficult and she makes assignments enjoyable.

Erin was great at keeping every class interesting. I always wanted to attend class to hear what she had to say. She had a few guest speakers throughout the semester that were very interesting. The workload was a normal amount and was pretty easy. I definitely recommend taking her!

She's awesome! She's cool and real, teaches things that are realistic and takes topics from a real-world approach. She's very relaxed when it comes to feedback, conversation and things like that. Her attendance policy is no joke after two, but she's worth going to class for! Lot's of guest speakers.

She made wellness class interesting, I looked forward to it and actually learned a lot. Class is very much participation based. Homework is easy and all online. The midterm and final are also online but they can be a bit tricky if you aren't ready.
The class is pretty tame, but Weger did a good job with it. If you turn in all of the assignments and come to all of the classes, you pretty much can't help but pass.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tests? Not many

comment: Amazing professor! The best I have had at KSU. She cares about her students success and is very passionate about the class. It's an easy A if you go to class and complete all of the assignments on Bearface. Her lectures are super easy to listen to yet very informational. It was my favorite class and it was fun. Take her for this class!!
I LOVE HER. If you have the opportunity to take her, do it. While attendance is mandatory, she makes her classes SO fun and she is energetic. Definitely my favorite professor I had this semester.

Professor Carter is by far the best professor I've ever had. She makes every class interesting and she really loves what she does. She has a strict attendance policy but lectures are definitely worth showing up for and it's an easy A.

I have never enjoyed a class so much in my life. Professor Carter is literally a gem. I've learned so much from being in this class. Lessons that I will forever carry on in my life. I've never written a review before, but she seriously is worth the time out my day to tell you how freaking awesome she is. I love her class and her lol.
I would deff take this professor again! She is the best, such an easy A. SOOO funny, she makes the class very enjoyable.

She's seriously hilarious, and I enjoyed her lectures, but I would def recommend taking this class online. She explained all the Bearface assignments in class the best she could, but they're honestly self-explanatory. By the end of the semester, I felt like going to class was a waste because we didn't do any of our Bearface stuff in class.

i loved having her as my professor. Every class was interesting and hilarious and I enjoyed going even though it was early in the morning. Very minimal work but make sure you complete the modules and with effort because she grades those kind of hard, but the class was still an easy A. I would take her again for sure.

Amazing professor. Made Monday 8 am's so enjoyable. I didn't want to leave her class! She is super funny and relates so well with the students. She is very engaging. I wish I could have her as a teacher again!
Best professor I've ever had. She's engaging and makes topics relatable. I've always left her class with a smile on my face- please take her class, you won't regret it!
